Sentencas: The principal aim of the current research is the design and optimization of a multi-generation unit capable of generating electricity and potable water and hydrogen.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: The system comprises a gas turbine unit, a high-temperature solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a combustion chamber, and a multi-effect desalination (MED) system.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: The pressurized steam and fuel enter the anode side of high-temperature SOFC and the air goes to the cathode side.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: Due to reactions inside the SOFC, a high amount of electricity produces, and excess H-2 enters the combustion chamber.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: Hot flue gases can run a gas turbine and a MED unit to generate more electrical power and desalinated water.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: The study illustrated the impact of current density on voltage losses and output power and output voltage of SOFC.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: A parametric examination is also conducted to demonstrate the influence of primary design variables on the system performance.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: Exergo-economic multi-criteria optimization is used to determine the optimized parameters to obtain the higher efficiency and lower cost of fuel and equipment.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: Calculations represented that the suggested arrangement is able to generate 53.46 kg/s desalinated water, and 54.8 MW electricity and 7.43 kg/h hydrogen energy.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option

Sentencas: The system exergy efficiency under this condition is about 36.45% but the results of optimization showed that this value could rise up between 50.8% and 61.17% with the lowest system cost.
Titulo: Design and exergy based optimization of a clean energy system with fuel Cell/MED and hydrogen storage option
